notes: Enhanced user experience by adding a direct link to the Garage Management page from the 'no garages' warning message.
Architectural Improvement: Separated changelog and defect resolution data into their own JSON files for easier maintenance.
Fixed a critical defect where the main 'Click to Get Ready' button was unresponsive due to a race condition.
Added a stock vehicle photo for vehicles without an uploaded image.
Architectural Improvement: Separated the app version into its own `version.py` file to simplify updates.
Fixed a UI defect where the user's helmet icon was not centered above the username in the profile selection modal.
